div.div:
Problem:
* impossible to pass in enough stake accounts in one instruction and update the total, too many stake accounts under management by stake pool

div.div:
* Hash table max 10k entries
validator pubkey ->
* whether stake pool is open for deposits (avoid people depositing after start of epoch)

div.div: Sysvar for all stake accounts at the end of each epoch

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 520px; margin-left: 391px;

div.div: * create stake account at validator key
* use [stake pool key, validator key, stake pool program] as seeds for program address
* only usable by owner, withdraw authority is stake pool

div.div: * take in stake account sysvar, start index, amount of accounts to check
* go through hashtable entries, create program address [stake pool key, validator key, stake pool program], find in sysvar, update stake amount / epoch
